body: You can shrug off sleep and paralysis effects as well as any dragon, and your draconic aspects improve.
name: Draconic Paragon
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Kobolds/New Racial Rules/Kobold Feats/Draconic Paragon

sections.body: Draconic Aspect, either Draconic Breath or Draconic Glide, character level 10th, kobold.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You gain an additional +2 bonus against sleep and paralysis effects. You can use your breath weapon twice per day and your breath weapon damage increases to 4d6 points of energy damage. Your wings from the Draconic Glide feat grow stronger, granting you a fly speed of 20 feet (average maneuverability).
sections.name: Benefit
